projects.title: The Wild Oasis
projects.bodyText:
- A hotel room booking app with cabin reservation functionality and user authentication.
 - Implemented data visualization, including pie charts and graphs, to showcase occupancy and sales trends

projects.title: Fast React Pizza
projects.bodyText:
- An online pizza ordering platform enabling users to customize and order a variety of pizzas from a menu.
 - Implemented a 'current location' feature for efficient delivery.

projects.title: World Wise
projects.bodyText:
- A visited city tracking app, allowing user to effortlessly manage their visited cities.
 - Effortlessly integrated map services for swift city input and added a 'current location' function for improved usability.

projects.title: Usepopcorn
projects.bodyText:
- A movie search platform.
 - Integrated a star rating system.
 - Generates a catalog of viewed films.
 - Utilizes an external API to retrieve movie information.

projects.title: Far Away
projects.bodyText:
- An app for travel packing lists.
 - Displays items and quantities needed for trips.
 - Allows users to mark items as taken for easy tracking.
 - Simplifies travel item management.

projects.title: React Quiz
projects.bodyText:
- Interactive React Quiz App with timers, replay functionality, and real-time score tracking.
 - Utilizes a JSON file as an API to fetch questions and answers, ensuring dynamic and diverse quiz content.

projects.title: Eat n Split
projects.bodyText:
- Simplifies bill splitting among friends.
 -  Allows users to split bills and make individual payments.

projects.title: Chrome extension
projects.bodyText:
- For quick URL storage.
 - Easily add and organize URLs for future reference.

projects.title: Black jack game
projects.bodyText:
- Classic Blackjack card game.Providing an enjoyable gaming experience.
 - Offers engaging gameplay with strategy and luck.

projects.title: Classy Weather
projects.bodyText:
- offers a 7-day weather forecast.
- Users can input their location for personalized weather updates
